game.name: Altiros
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, RPG, 무료 플레이
game.shortDescription: Build! Craft! Destroy! Jump on clouds and fight cute monsters in skill-based battles of steel, magic and spirit in this online sandbox adventure set in a fantastical world of sky islands!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Build! Craft! Destroy! Jump on clouds and fight cute monsters in skill-based battles of steel, magic and spirit in this online sandbox adventure set in a fantastical world of sky islands!
